mapper.select: SELECT MTR_CD, MTR_NM FROM C_MTR M
SELECT ACT_CD, ACT_NM FROM C_ACT
SELECT EMP_NM, EMP_ID FROM C_EMP

SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, D.MTR_CD, C.MTR_NM, D.MAT_ODD_MN, D.MAT_ODD_AMT, O.MAT_SUM, A.ACT_CD, A.ACT_NM, TO_CHAR(O.MAT_OD_DD, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_OD_DD", TO_CHAR(D.MAT_ODD_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_ODD_DATE" FROM M_OD O
JOIN M_ODD D ON O.MAT_OD_CD = D.MAT_OD_CD
JOIN C_MTR C ON D.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON D.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD
MAT_OD_DD >= #{matOddDate}
AND MAT_OD_DD <= #{matOdDd}
ORDER BY O.MAT_OD_DD
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL INTO M_OD (MAT_OD_CD, MAT_OD_DD, MAT_OD_STS, MAT_SUM) VALUES('OMAT-' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD-') || LPAD(MAT_OD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,0) ,CURRENT_DATE ,'N' ,#{matSum})
INTO M_ODD (MAT_ODD_CD, MAT_OD_CD, MTR_CD, ACT_CD, MAT_ODD_MN, MAT_ODD_AMT, MAT_ODD_DATE) VALUES('DMAT-' || LPAD(MAT_ODD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,0) ,'OMAT-' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD-') || LPAD(MAT_OD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,0) ,#{mtrCd} ,#{actCd} ,#{matOddMn} ,#{matOddAmt} ,#{matOddDate})
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select:
SELECT D.PPLN_CD, D.PRD_CD, P.PRD_NM, D.PPLND_AMT, TO_CHAR(B.DE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "DE_DATE" FROM P_PLND D
JOIN C_PRD P ON D.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD JOIN B_OD B ON B.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD
SELECT P.PPLN_CD, P.PPLN_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PPLN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "PPLN_DATE" FROM P_PLN P JOIN P_PLND D ON P.PPLN_CD = D.PPLN_CD WHERE D.PPLND_STS = '자재팀확인'

SELECT P.PPLN_CD, P.PPLN_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PPLN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "PPLN_DATE", TO_CHAR(O.MAT_OD_DD, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_OD_DD" FROM P_PLN P JOIN B_OD B ON B.OD_CD = P.OD_CD JOIN C_ACT A ON A.ACT_CD = B.ACT_CD JOIN M_ODD D ON D.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD JOIN M_OD O ON O.MAT_OD_CD = D.MAT_OD_CD JOIN P_PLND D ON P.PPLN_CD = D.PPLN_CD WHERE MAT_OD_DD >= #{matOddDate} AND MAT_OD_DD <= #{matOdDd} AND D.PPLND_STS = '자재팀확인'

SELECT D.PPLN_CD, D.PRD_CD, C.PRD_NM, D.PPLND_AMT, TO_CHAR(B.DE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "DE_DATE" FROM P_PLND D
JOIN P_PLN P ON (D.PPLN_CD = P.PPLN_CD)
JOIN C_PRD C ON (D.PRD_CD = C.PRD_CD)
JOIN B_OD B ON (B.OD_CD = P.OD_CD)
WHERE D.PPLN_CD = #{value}
SELECT O.MTR_CD, M.MTR_NM, B.BOM_AMT FROM M_ODD O JOIN C_MTR M ON M.MTR_CD = O.MTR_CD JOIN C_BOM B ON B.MTR_CD = M.MTR_CD WHERE B.PRD_CD = #{value}

SELECT M.MTR_CD, M.MTR_NM, D.MAT_ODD_MN, D.MAT_ODD_AMT, (D.MAT_ODD_MN * D.MAT_ODD_AMT) AS "MAT_SUM", A.ACT_CD, A.ACT_NM, TO_CHAR(O.MAT_OD_DD,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "MAT_OD_DD", TO_CHAR(D.MAT_ODD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "MAT_ODD_DATE" FROM C_MTR M
JOIN M_ODD D ON (M.MTR_CD = D.MTR_CD)
JOIN M_OD O ON (D.MAT_OD_CD = O.MAT_OD_CD)
JOIN C_ACT A ON (D.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD)
WHERE M.MTR_CD = #{value}

SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, D.MTR_CD, C.MTR_NM, D.MAT_ODD_MN, D.MAT_ODD_AMT, O.MAT_SUM, A.ACT_CD, A.ACT_NM, TO_CHAR(O.MAT_OD_DD, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_OD_DD", TO_CHAR(D.MAT_ODD_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_ODD_DATE" FROM M_OD O
JOIN M_ODD D ON O.MAT_OD_CD = D.MAT_OD_CD
JOIN C_MTR C ON D.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON D.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD

SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, M.MTR_NM, D.MAT_ODD_MN, D.MAT_ODD_AMT, O.MAT_SUM, A.ACT_NM, TO_CHAR(D.MAT_ODD_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_ODD_DATE" FROM M_OD O JOIN M_ODD D ON O.MAT_OD_CD = D.MAT_OD_CD JOIN C_MTR M ON M.ACT_CD = D.ACT_CD JOIN C_ACT A ON A.ACT_CD = M.ACT_CD
WHERE O.MAT_OD_CD = #{matOdCd}
SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, D.MTR_CD, D.MAT_ODD_AMT,C.MTR_NM FROM M_OD O JOIN M_ODD D ON D.MAT_OD_CD = O.MAT_OD_CD JOIN C_MTR C ON C.MTR_CD = D.MTR_CD WHERE MAT_OD_STS = 'N'
SELECT COMMD_CD, COMMD_NM FROM C_COMMD WHERE COMM_CD = 'ERR-MNP'
mapper.insert:
SELECT MK_MATCHK_CD FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO M_CHK (MAT_CHK_CD, MAT_OD_CD, PA_AMT, ER_AMT, EMP_NM, MAT_CHK_DATE, ER_CD, ER_INFO) VALUES (#{matChkCd}, #{matOdCd}, #{paAmt}, #{erAmt}, #{empNm}, #{matChkDate}, #{erCd}, #{erInfo})
mapper.select:
SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, D.MTR_CD, C.MTR_NM, A.ACT_NM, I.MAT_IN_AMT, TO_CHAR(K.MAT_CHK_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_CHK_DATE", TO_CHAR(I.MAT_EDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_EDATE" FROM M_OD O
JOIN M_ODD D ON O.MAT_OD_CD = D.MAT_OD_CD
JOIN C_MTR C ON D.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON D.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD
JOIN M_IN I ON I.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
JOIN M_CHK K ON K.MAT_OD_CD = O.MAT_OD_CD
ORDER BY MAT_OD_CD
mapper.insert:
SELECT MK_MAT_LOT(#{mtrCd}) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO M_IN (MAT_LOT, MTR_CD, ACT_CD, MAT_IN_AMT, MAT_SAMT, MAT_EDATE, MAT_IN_DATE ) VALUES(#{matLot}, #{mtrCd}, #{actCd}, #{matInAmt}, #{matSamt}, #{matEdate}, #{matInDate})
mapper.select:
SELECT D.PODD_CD, O.POD_CD, O.PRD_CD, D.PODD_AMT, TO_CHAR(D.PODD_DATES, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "PODD_DATES", TO_CHAR(O.POD_DATES, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "POD_DATES", D.PODD_STS
FROM P_OD O
JOIN P_ODD D ON D.POD_CD = O.POD_CD
WHERE D.PODD_STS = '자재팀확인'

SELECT T.MAT_LOT, T.MTR_CD, M.MTR_NM, A.ACT_NM, I.MAT_SAMT, TO_CHAR(I.MAT_EDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_EDATE"
FROM M_OUT T
JOIN C_MTR M ON M.MTR_CD = T.MTR_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON M.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD
JOIN M_IN I ON I.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD

SELECT P.PRD_CD, B.MTR_CD, (SELECT FIND_MTR_NAME(B.MTR_CD) FROM DUAL) AS "MTR_NM" , ((SELECT FIND_BOM_AMT(P.PRD_CD,B.MTR_CD) FROM DUAL) * #{poddAmt}) AS "AMT" FROM C_PRD P
JOIN C_BOM B ON B.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD
JOIN P_OD D ON D.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD
JOIN P_ODD O ON O.POD_CD = D.POD_CD
WHERE P.PRD_CD = #{prdCd} AND O.PODD_CD = #{poddCd} AND B.MTR_CD IS NOT NULL

SELECT I.MAT_LOT, M.MTR_NM, I.MAT_SAMT, TO_CHAR(I.MAT_EDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_EDATE"
FROM M_IN I
JOIN C_MTR M ON M.MTR_CD = I.MTR_CD
WHERE M.MTR_NM = #{mtrNm}

SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, D.MTR_CD, C.MTR_NM, A.ACT_NM, I.MAT_IN_AMT, TO_CHAR(I.MAT_IN_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_IN_DATE", I.MAT_LOT, TO_CHAR(I.MAT_EDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_EDATE"
FROM M_OD O
JOIN M_ODD D ON O.MAT_OD_CD = D.MAT_OD_CD
JOIN C_MTR C ON D.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON D.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD
JOIN M_IN I ON I.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
ORDER BY O.MAT_OD_CD

SELECT I.MAT_LOT, C.MTR_CD, C.MTR_NM, A.ACT_NM, T.MAT_OUT_AMT, TO_CHAR(T.MAT_OUT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_OUT_DATE", TO_CHAR(I.MAT_EDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_EDATE"
FROM M_IN I
JOIN C_MTR C ON I.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON A.ACT_CD = I.ACT_CD
JOIN M_OUT T ON C.MTR_CD = T.MTR_CD
ORDER BY I.MAT_LOT

SELECT I.MAT_LOT, C.MTR_CD, C.MTR_NM, A.ACT_NM, I.MAT_SAMT, TO_CHAR(I.MAT_EDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_EDATE", C.MTR_SFAMT
FROM M_IN I
JOIN C_MTR C ON I.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON A.ACT_CD = I.ACT_CD

SELECT B.MTR_CD, FIND_MTR_NAME(B.MTR_CD) AS "MTR_NM", B.BOM_AMT*P.PPLND_AMT AS "AMT"
FROM C_BOM B
JOIN P_PLND P ON B.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD
WHERE P.PPLND_STS = '미지시' AND B.MTR_CD IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY B.MTR_CD, B.BOM_AMT*P.PPLND_AMT, B.BOM_CD
ORDER BY B.MTR_CD, B.BOM_CD

SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, I.MTR_CD, FIND_MTR_NAME(I.MTR_CD) AS "MTR_NM", A.ACT_NM, K.ER_AMT, TO_CHAR(K.MAT_CHK_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_CHK_DATE"
FROM M_IN I
JOIN M_ODD D ON I.MTR_CD = D.MTR_CD
JOIN M_OD O ON O.MAT_OD_CD = D.MAT_OD_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON A.ACT_CD = D.ACT_CD JOIN M_CHK K ON K.MAT_OD_CD = O.MAT_OD_CD
WHERE K.ER_CD != 'XXXX'
ORDER BY K.MAT_OD_CD

SELECT MK_MATRT_CD FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO M_RT( MAT_RT_CD, MAT_CHK_CD, MTR_CD, ACT_CD, MAT_RT_AMT, MAT_RT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{matRtCd}, (SELECT GET_RECHK_CD(#{matOdCd}) FROM DUAL), (SELECT GET_REMTR_CD(#{matOdCd}) FROM DUAL), (SELECT GET_REACT_CD(#{matOdCd}) FROM DUAL), (SELECT GET_REAMT_CD(#{matOdCd}) FROM DUAL), #{matRtDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT O.MAT_OD_CD, K.ER_CD, K.ER_INFO, TO_CHAR(K.MAT_CHK_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_CHK_DATE"
FROM M_OD O
JOIN M_CHK K ON K.MAT_OD_CD = O.MAT_OD_CD
WHERE O.MAT_OD_CD = #{matOdCd}

SELECT K.MAT_OD_CD, T.MTR_CD, FIND_MTR_NAME(T.MTR_CD) AS "MTR_NM", A.ACT_NM, T.MAT_RT_AMT, TO_CHAR(T.MAT_RT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_RT_DATE", TO_CHAR(K.MAT_CHK_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "MAT_CHK_DATE", K.ER_CD, K.ER_INFO FROM M_RT T
JOIN M_CHK K ON T.MAT_CHK_CD = K.MAT_CHK_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON A.ACT_CD = T.ACT_CD
